entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:57 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Windy. High minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
